content: When she heard that they were so happy, and so well off, envy and hatred rose in her heart and left her no peace, and she thought of nothing but how she could bring them again to misfortune.
translations: ita:Quando seppe che erano così felici, e così benestanti, l'invidia e l'odio crebbero nel suo cuore e non le davano pace, e
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
